Celsius.
Alert: <35.0, ≥ 37. 5
Temperature should be monitored 
throughout labour to assess the well-
being of the woman and identify risks 
for adverse birth outcomes (5).
 If temperature 
<35.0 or ≥37. 5, 
alert a senior care 
provider and follow 
local guidelines.
 If temperature is 
between 35.0 and 
37.4 degrees, assess 
temperature every 
4 hours.
Urine
Check protein 
and acetone 
in urine with a 
reagent strip.
Record readings 
of protein (P) and 
acetone (A) as 
Negative, Trace, +,
